releaseNotes: - User Interface is largely modified (e.g. Overall, CPU, GPU, Battery, LMK, Misc etc).
- Moved almost all the information services (Battery, charging & RAM) into the overall page.
- CPU: cleaned up & updated MSM Limiter.
- About: added information about app translators.
- Battery: added OTG Switch to permanently enable USB On-The-Go (OTG) mode.
- AppUpdater: merged updates from the upstream repo
- Miscellaneous changes and internal improvements. Please visit GitHub for more informationMisc.
